title: Transmutation Spells
content: Transmutation Action Strike at a target with a thorny, vine-like whip. It deals 1d6 Piercing damage and pulls the target 3m closer to you if it is Large or Smaller in size. Druid Create or Destroy Water Lv 1 Transmutation ActionSpell Slot Call forth rain or destroy a water-based. 9m Cleric, Sorcerer, Druid Expeditious Retreat Lv 1 Transmutation Bonus ActionSpell Slot Gain Dash immediately and as a bonus action on each of your turns until this spell ends.Until Long Rest1 Tur.Concentration Warloc
